typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> SourceMovies1
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> SourceMovie2
SourceMovies1, SourceMovie2 join(SourceMovies1@title == SourceMovie2@title,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'off')~> Join
